html_script_tags.description: script[src] tags in HTML files reference JS entry points

npm_scripts.description: File paths referenced in package.json scripts

config_entries.description: Entry points defined in webpack, rollup, esbuild configs

monorepo_package_mains.description: main/module/exports fields of workspace packages that are depended upon

monorepo_package_exports.description: ALL subpath exports from workspace package.json exports field, not just the '.' entry. Each export key maps to a file that is a published API surface.

di_container_references.description: Classes referenced via DI container methods (Container.get, Injector.resolve, etc.) are loaded at runtime

file_patterns.name: Worker thread entry points
file_patterns.reason: Worker files are loaded dynamically by worker_threads or web workers

file_patterns.name: Enterprise handler/service files
file_patterns.reason: Enterprise edition files with .ee. suffix are dynamically loaded based on license

file_patterns.name: Scanner/CLI utility directories
file_patterns.reason: Scanner directories contain CLI utilities often loaded as package bin entries

file_patterns.name: Error class files in errors directories
file_patterns.reason: Error classes in errors/ directories are often auto-exported or dynamically loaded

file_patterns.name: Grammar/parser term files
file_patterns.reason: Grammar term files (CodeMirror, PEG.js, etc.) are generated and loaded by parser systems

file_patterns.name: Config directories
file_patterns.reason: Files in config/configs directories are loaded dynamically by configuration systems

file_patterns.name: Experiment/A-B test directories
file_patterns.reason: Experiment directories contain A/B test variants loaded dynamically at runtime

file_patterns.name: Vue/framework mixin directories
file_patterns.reason: Mixin directories contain mixins imported dynamically or via plugin systems

file_patterns.name: Benchmark directories
file_patterns.reason: Benchmark directories contain standalone performance tests

file_patterns.name: Workflow definition directories
file_patterns.reason: Workflow directories contain workflow definitions loaded dynamically at runtime

file_patterns.name: Playground directories
file_patterns.reason: Playground directories contain standalone demo/test apps loaded independently

file_patterns.name: Documentation source directories
file_patterns.reason: Documentation source directories (docs_src/) contain runnable code examples

file_patterns.name: Theme override directories
file_patterns.reason: Theme directories contain framework theme overrides loaded by convention (e.g., Docusaurus swizzle)

file_patterns.name: Integration test directories
file_patterns.reason: Integration test directories contain standalone test suites run separately from unit tests

file_patterns.name: Website content directories
file_patterns.reason: Website directories contain documentation site source loaded by static site generators

file_patterns.name: Python type stub files
file_patterns.reason: Type stub files (.pyi) are loaded by type checkers at runtime, not imported

file_patterns.name: Typeshed directories
file_patterns.reason: Typeshed directories contain bundled type stubs loaded by type checkers

file_patterns.name: E2E test directories
file_patterns.reason: E2E test directories contain standalone test applications and fixtures

file_patterns.name: Generated code files
file_patterns.reason: Generated files (*.gen.ts) are created by code generators and loaded at runtime

file_patterns.name: Generated code directories
file_patterns.reason: Directories with -generated or _generated suffix contain auto-generated code

file_patterns.name: Sandbox/demo directories
file_patterns.reason: Sandbox directories contain standalone demo apps for testing

file_patterns.name: Classic/legacy compatibility modules
file_patterns.reason: Classic/compat/legacy modules are dynamically re-exported for backwards compatibility

file_patterns.name: Library build output directories
file_patterns.reason: lib/ directories contain compiled/built output consumed by package consumers

file_patterns.name: Demo/example directories
file_patterns.reason: Demo directories contain example code loaded by documentation systems

file_patterns.name: Deprecated code directories
file_patterns.reason: Deprecated directories contain old code kept for reference or migration

file_patterns.name: System test directories
file_patterns.reason: System test directories contain test fixtures and integration test projects

file_patterns.name: Documentation data directories
file_patterns.reason: Documentation data directories contain example code loaded dynamically by doc sites

file_patterns.name: Project fixture directories
file_patterns.reason: Project fixture directories contain test project templates

file_patterns.name: Test snapshot directories
file_patterns.reason: Snapshot directories contain test snapshot files loaded by test runners

file_patterns.name: Starter template directories
file_patterns.reason: Starter directories contain project templates copied when creating new projects
